Replies.Reply: Written by  Mark Boal     October 3rd, 2011    FROM BLACK, VOICES EMERGE--
I own you, Ammar. You belong to me.
If you don't look at me when I talk to you, I hurt you. If you step off this mat, I hurt you. If you lie to me, I'm gonna hurt you. Now, Look at me.
Look at me, Ammar.
Are we gonna board up these windows or what?
Just off the plane from Washington, you're rocking your best suit for your first interrogation, and then you get this guy. It's not always this intense.
Just so you know, it's going to take awhile. He has to learn how helpless he is. Let's get a coffee.
You know, there's no shame if you wanna watch from the monitor.
Alright.
You might want to put this on.
Never.

Right now, this is about you coming to terms with your situation. It's you and me, bro. I want you to understand that I know you, that I've been studying you for a very long time. I could have had you killed Karachi. But I let you live so you and I could talk.
Life isn't always fair, my friend.
And you're a money man. A paperboy!
A disgrace to humanity!
hijacker.
And you got popped with 150 kilograms of high explosives in your house!
I'm just fucking with you.
What I want to focus on is the Saudi group.
That there is Hazem al-Kashmiri.
I know that you know him.
Have it your way.
Let's go.
Grab the bucket.
Put some water in it.
C'mon, let's go.
Hazem was a friend of Ramzi Yousef, you guys met in Tunisia back in the 70s.
You're a terrorist, that's why I'm doing it to you.
I want emails of the rest of the Saudi group. Give me emails of the rest of the Saudi group! Give me one email, and I will stop this!
Who's in the Saudi group, and what's the target? Where was the last time you saw bin Laden? WHERE WAS THE  LAST TIME YOU SAW BIN LADEN?
This is what defeat looks like, bro.
Get him up.
Try to understand the concept here.
It was good. The local cops need tactical help. But he's Tier fucking One, baby. There's your money maker.
He's being a dick.
I am going to have to turn up the heat. He needs to give us the Saudi group now.
Daniel knocks on the glass for Maya to come in.
Was I lying or what?
Maya, this is Joseph Bradley, our illustrious station chief.
Joe and I did Iraq together.
She's been having a great time ever since she got in, isn't that right?
Don't you think she's a little young for the hard stuff?
The children's crusade.
They're slow rolling us in Lahore -
Dude, I've been in a dark room with another man for the last two days.
Everyone, this is Maya. Maya, everyone.
Please don't ask how it's going with Ammar because she's not going to fucking tell you.
- Best man for it.
Any imminent threats in here?
And that's a conversation?
I think he'll give up the Saudis.
Great.
I agree, I spoke to the Chief about that. Anything on bin Laden?

No, don't need him, the diamond sighting is bullshit. See if the Paks will send someone to talk to the farmer. Anything else? We need to be putting runs on the board against Faraj. Speak to the case officers who didn't see fit to make it today. And thank them.
Let's take it easy today, huh?
Hungry? The food in here sucks so I got you some of this.
Richard Reid, wow. I was thinking about him. The guy gets a bomb in his shoe on a plane. Unbelievable.

When you lie to me, I hurt you.
I believe you. I do, I believe you.
Do you want the water again, or do you want something else?
Just give me a name.
You see how this works? You don't mind if my female colleague sees your junk, do you?
Dude, you shit your pants.
You stay here, I'll be back.
This is a dog collar.
You determine how I treat you.
I'm going to walk you.
What the fuck do you think is going on, Ammar? Wahleed has already told me that you know.
This box sucks. I'm going to put you in it.

Sunday? Sunday where? This Sunday or next Sunday?
Is it Sunday or Monday?
Which day is it? Partial information is treated as a lie.

Yeah, now.
Who said that? Zied? Fuck him.
Bluff him?
Which is the smart thing to do, you're starting to think for yourself.

do after the invasion and before you went back to Pesh?

Cigarette?
